title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No. 138 of 2011), and with
heading: 1. (1) These Rules may be cited as the Prison (Disciplinary Code for
text_raw:
1. (1) These Rules may be cited as the Prison (Disciplinary Code for 

Officers) (Revocation) Rules 2020. 

(2) These Rules come into operation on 1 October 2020.

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No. 138 of 2011), and with
heading: 3. Where, before the date on which these Rules come into operation, an
text_raw:
3. Where, before the date on which these Rules come into operation, an 
allegation against an officer of a breach of discipline has been made under Rule 
7 of the Prison (Disciplinary Code for Officers) Rules 1996 (S.I. No. 289 of 
1996) (“revoked Rules”) and, by that date, the allegation has not been dealt 
with, the allegation shall continue to be dealt with under the revoked Rules. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 28th July, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Government approve of the making of the foregoing Rules 

[261] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

21 July, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 July, 2020. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 

Minister for Justice and Equality. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [261]
